verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
VERSE 1
Lift up your eyes, behold the King
The Lamb of God who carried our sin
So clear the way, open the door
The King of glory, our Saviour comes

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
CHORUS
Hallelujah, shouts the earth
Hallelujah, Jesus reigns

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
VERSE 2
From heaven's throne to Calvary
He conquered death, He set us free
The ground will shake as Zion roars
The King of glory, our Saviour comes

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
BRIDGE
Holy, Holy is the Lord
Holy, Holy is the Lord
Holy, Holy is the Lord
Holy, Holy is the Lord
